name: asagi
normalized: if i can't do it with one blow…!
asagi promptly readied her sword, and stopped the majuu's horn head-on.
clashing with it, asagi somehow withstood force that seemed to actually make sparks fly.
she completely stopped its charge, then immediately cut round to the side of the majuu, making use of her much- vaunted speed.

name: asagi
normalized: then, consecutive blows!
haah!
like a flash of light, she put all the energy of her body into swinging her sword down towards the back of the majuu, which was armoured by tough body fur.
as expected, the sword was repelled, but asagi even made use of that reaction to slash at the beast, letting her blade take a path symmetrical to that of the first attack.
another blow, to the same point on the majuu's back.
even more blows.
she immediately focused her spiritual energy, then put it into her blade and swung it hard.

name: asagi
normalized: it got through!
the same point was exposed to consecutive light-speed attacks, and a superficial wound ran down the majuu's back.
the majuu was thrashing around recklessly, in a fit of anger.

name: asagi
normalized: kuh!
leaving it to instinct, without any kind of regularity, it attacked asagi hard enough to stop her arm movements.
it swung both forelegs, from the side and above,
and tried to gouge asagi's torso with its gigantic horn.
asagi became unable to switch from offence to defence due to the majuu's lightning speed, and to the heavy attack, which nearly bent her sword.
taking advantage of that opportunity, a completely unexpected attack swept towards asagi's side.

name: asagi
normalized: cra──?!

name: asagi
normalized: guuh!
at the same time as the attacks from its horn and claws, its thick tail, which bent like a whip, scythed down asagi's torso.
asagi took that directly, and was blown away.
but, adjusting her posture in midair, she turned all the way around and landed.

name: asagi
normalized: ukuh…!
asagi screwed up her face, and, perhaps because it had seen its chance, the majuu charged at her again with force like that of a runaway train.
just like a flash of light.
making the large horn on its head shine dully.
asagi was still grimacing from having received the blow from its tail.
